title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 118.2 - Land requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 118.2 - Land requirements

State Regulations
(a) To
be eligible for the production of foundation seed a field must not have grown
or been seeded to the same species during the previous five years. (b) To be eligible for the production of
certified seed, a field must not have grown or been seeded to another strain or
variety of flatpea during the previous three years, except with foundation or
certified seed of the same variety. (c) No manure or other contaminating
amendments shall be applied during the established and productive life of the
stand. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
118.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
